thread.title: Rob Holler
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Rob Holler

author: Rob Holler
title: Rob Holler
text: Great team at TownFairTire in Saugus! I originally purchased 4 tires, and did not like them at all, returned them in two weeks with zero issues and no fees. Tyler, a sales rep, made this experience for me. He is very knowledgeable, trustworthy, and he definitely devotes his time and practice for the best interest of the customer. I am fairly hard to please, but Tyler worked with me on multiple occasions to get me the tires that fit my car perfectly. I could not be happier with his service, assistance, time, knowledge, and how carefully he listened to me to best understand what I was looking for!
